Text: Summary of laboratory data for Week 7 (week ending February 15, 2025)

In week 7 (week ending February 15, 2025) in Canada, percent positivity is currently highest for influenza (26.9% positive) among respiratory viruses under surveillance. The following results were reported from RVDSS laboratories:
Influenza (includes influenza A and B)
Influenza percent positivity continues to increase (11,790 detections; 26.9% positive).
SARS-CoV-2 (the virus which causes COVID-19)
National SARS-CoV-2 percent positivity continues to decrease (1,750 detections; 4.0% positive).
RSV (respiratory syncytial virus)
National RSV percent positivity continues to decrease (1,938 detections; 4.9% positive).
Other respiratory viruses
Percent positivity of all other respiratory viruses is following historically observed trends.
Number of reporting laboratories
34 out of 35 laboratories reported surveillance data.
